metadata.description: Comprehensive database of Indian legal cases across various practice areas
metadata.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice

cases.title: Sharma v. Gupta - Property Boundary Dispute
cases.summary: Civil suit regarding boundary wall construction between adjacent properties. Delhi High Court ruled in favor of plaintiff, ordering defendant to demolish unauthorized construction and pay damages of ₹5 lakhs.

cases.title: Rajesh Kumar v. XYZ Technologies Ltd. - Wrongful Termination
cases.summary: Employment dispute where employee was terminated without proper notice period. Labour Court awarded compensation of ₹8 lakhs and ordered reinstatement with back wages under Industrial Disputes Act.

cases.title: State of Maharashtra v. Anil Deshmukh - Corruption Charges
cases.summary: Criminal case under Prevention of Corruption Act involving bribery charges against public official. Bombay High Court convicted defendant, sentenced to 3 years imprisonment and fine of ₹10 lakhs.

cases.title: Priya Mehta v. ABC Bank - Consumer Complaint
cases.summary: Consumer complaint against bank for unauthorized debit and poor service. National Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission ordered bank to refund ₹2 lakhs with interest and pay compensation.

cases.title: Sunita Devi v. Ramesh Devi - Matrimonial Dispute
cases.summary: Divorce petition with maintenance claim under Hindu Marriage Act. Family Court granted divorce and ordered monthly maintenance of ₹25,000 for wife and ₹15,000 for child custody.

cases.title: Citizens for Clean Air v. State of Delhi - Environmental Petition
cases.summary: Public Interest Litigation regarding air pollution control measures. Supreme Court directed Delhi government to implement stricter emission norms and establish more monitoring stations.
legalProvisions: Air (Prevention and Control of Pollution) Act, 1981

cases.title: Income Tax Department v. Reliance Industries - Tax Evasion
cases.summary: Tax evasion case involving transfer pricing disputes. Income Tax Appellate Tribunal ruled partially in favor of assessee, reducing tax demand from ₹500 crores to ₹200 crores.

cases.title: Ravi Shankar v. State Transport Corporation - Motor Accident Claim
cases.summary: Motor accident compensation claim under Motor Vehicles Act. Motor Accident Claims Tribunal awarded ₹15 lakhs compensation for permanent disability caused by bus accident.

cases.title: Dr. Kavita Sharma v. Medical Council of India - Professional Misconduct
cases.summary: Professional misconduct case against medical practitioner for negligence. Medical Council suspended license for 2 years and imposed fine under Indian Medical Council Act.
cases.judge: Ethics Committee Chairman Dr. Rajesh Gupta

cases.title: Farmers Union v. State Government - Land Acquisition
cases.summary: Challenge to land acquisition for industrial project under Land Acquisition Act. High Court quashed acquisition citing inadequate compensation and lack of proper consultation.
legalProvisions: Right to Fair Compensation and Transparency in Land Acquisition Act, 2013

cases.title: Tech Solutions Pvt. Ltd. v. Former Employee - Non-Compete Violation
cases.summary: Breach of non-compete agreement and trade secrets violation. Delhi High Court granted injunction restraining employee from working with competitor for 1 year.

cases.title: Minority Rights Forum v. State of Gujarat - Fundamental Rights
cases.summary: Constitutional petition challenging discriminatory government policy. Supreme Court struck down policy as violative of Articles 14 and 21 of the Constitution.

cases.title: Builders Association v. Municipal Corporation - Building Permits
cases.summary: Challenge to new building regulations and permit procedures. High Court upheld regulations but directed corporation to streamline approval process within 60 days.
legalProvisions: Building and Other Construction Workers Act, 1996

cases.title: Software Engineers Union v. IT Company - Overtime Compensation
cases.summary: Collective dispute regarding overtime payment and working hours in IT sector. Labour Court ordered company to pay pending overtime dues of ₹2 crores to employees.

cases.title: Intellectual Property Rights Society v. Piracy Network - Copyright Infringement
cases.summary: Copyright infringement case against online piracy network. Delhi High Court ordered blocking of websites and awarded damages of ₹50 lakhs to copyright holders.

cases.title: Pension Fund Regulatory Authority v. Insurance Company - Regulatory Violation
cases.summary: Regulatory violation case for non-compliance with pension fund investment norms. Securities Appellate Tribunal imposed penalty of ₹5 crores and directed compliance within 90 days.
legalProvisions: Securities and Exchange Board of India Act, 1992
Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority Act, 2013

cases.title: Telecom Operators Association v. Department of Telecommunications - Spectrum Allocation
cases.summary: Challenge to spectrum allocation policy and pricing. Telecom Disputes Settlement Appellate Tribunal modified policy and reduced spectrum prices by 20%.
legalProvisions: Telecom Regulatory Authority of India Act, 1997

cases.title: Women's Rights Collective v. State Police - Gender Discrimination
cases.summary: Public Interest Litigation challenging gender-based discrimination in police recruitment. Supreme Court directed implementation of 33% reservation for women in police force.
